description:
The Mino Three get tired of Tatsuoki`s constant partying. Chidori goes to Mino to assassinate Takenaka Hanbee, but the Mino Three find her!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Celui qui domine Mino dominera le monde
Mino o Seisu Mono wa Tenka o Seisa
The One Who Rules Mino Rules the Land
美濃を制す者は天下を制す
